item.title: Oil prices jump and stocks tumble following Israel's attack on Iran

item.title: 'I just walked out': The sole survivor of the Air India crash shares his story
item.description: Viswashkumar Ramesh was on his way home to London when tragedy struck. In hospital interviews, he explains how he made his way out of seat 11A — which isn't typically the safest part of the plane.
